mapper.select: SELECT s.survey_no, s.survey_title, s.survey_image, s.survey_description, s.survey_closing_at, s.open_status_no, s.survey_status_no, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tag_name) AS tag_names, sq.survey_question_no, sq.survey_question_title, sq.survey_question_description, sq.question_type_no, sq.is_required, se.selection_no, se.survey_question_move_no, se.selection_value, se.is_movable, se.is_end_of_survey FROM survey s JOIN survey_question sq ON s.survey_no = sq.survey_no LEFT JOIN question_type qt ON sq.question_type_no = qt.question_type_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT selection_no, survey_question_no, survey_question_move_no, selection_value, is_movable, is_end_of_survey FROM selection) se ON sq.survey_question_no = se.survey_question_no LEFT JOIN survey_tag AS st ON s.survey_no = st.survey_no LEFT JOIN tag AS t ON st.tag_no = t.tag_no WHERE s.survey_no = #{surveyNo} AND s.survey_status_no = 1 GROUP BY s.survey_no, sq.survey_question_no, se.selection_no;

SELECT *, survey_attend.user_no as attend_user_no, if(survey_attend.user_no = #{userNo}, false, true) as attend_check FROM (SELECT survey.survey_no, survey_title, survey_description, survey_image, survey_post_at, survey_closing_at, user.user_no, user.user_nickname, user.user_image, survey_status.survey_status_name, os.open_status_name, count(survey_attend.survey_no) AS attend_count, is_deleted FROM survey LEFT JOIN survey_status ON survey.survey_status_no = survey_status.survey_status_no LEFT JOIN user ON user.user_no = survey.user_no LEFT JOIN open_status os ON survey.open_status_no = os.open_status_no LEFT JOIN survey_attend ON survey.survey_no = survey_attend.survey_no WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND survey_status.survey_status_no = 2
GROUP BY survey_status.survey_status_no, user.user_no, survey.survey_closing_at, os.open_status_no, survey.survey_no, survey_attend.survey_no ORDER BY survey_post_at DESC limit 10) a LEFT JOIN survey_attend ON a.survey_no = survey_attend.survey_no LEFT JOIN survey_tag ON a.survey_no = survey_tag.survey_no LEFT JOIN tag ON survey_tag.tag_no = tag.tag_no GROUP BY survey_tag.survey_tag_no, a.survey_no, survey_attend.user_no, survey_attend.survey_attend_no;
